modName: Zeleria the Witch of Mythic Dawn
summary: Add a standalone follower inspired by Mythic Dawn availabe for CBBE Curvy and UNP body.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][size=3][size=6]Zeleria the Witch of Mythic Dawn [/size][/size][size=3]
[/size]
Add a standalone follower inspired by Mythic Dawn
availabe for CBBE Curvy and UNP body.[size=3]
[/size][/size]
[size=3]Name : Zeleria
Race: Custom Nord
Body: CBBE Vanilla and UNP
Voiced: Female Eventoned

Essensial: False
Marrigable: True
Morality: Any Crime

Class: Mage Conjure
Stats: Levels 25 - 150
Extra: 1000 Health, Magika, and Stamina
Combat Style: [size=3]Mage Conjure[/size]

Outfit: [size=3]Mythic Dawn[/size]
Inventory: [size=3]-None-[/size]
Stats: Vanilla
Craftable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]
Upgradeable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]

Weapon: Zeleria Razor [Unplayable]
Stats: Vanilla
Craftable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]
Upgradeable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]

[size=3][b][b]Location:
[/b][/b][size=3][/size]Trap door inside Mythic Dawn Museum

[b]Required :
[/b]Skyrim.esm[b]
[/b]Update.esm[b]
[/b][b]
[/b][b][b]Installation : [/b]
[/b]NMM or copy to data folder[b]
